db:abstract.db:para: The QLayer class provides a way of filtering which entities will be rendered.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Qt3DRender::QLayer works in conjunction with the Qt3DRender::QLayerFilter in the FrameGraph.
Qt3DRender::QLayer doesn't define any new properties but is supposed to only be referenced.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QLayer::QLayer(Qt3DCore::QNode *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QLayer with the specified parent.
